Package index

ASCVD

Functions relating to ASCVD

ASCVD()
ASCVD (Atherosclerotic Cardiovascular Disease) Risk Algorithm including Known ASCVD from AHA/ACC function
ASCVD_scores()
ASCVD risk score function for data frame; ASCVD = Atherosclerotic Cardiovascular Disease

EDACS

Functions relating to EDACS

EDACS()
Emergency Department Assessment of Chest Pain Score (EDACS) function
EDACS_scores()
EDACS score function for data frame; EDACS = Emergency Department Assessment of Chest Pain Score

GRACE

Functions relating to GRACE

GRACE()
GRACE Global Registry of Acute Coronary Events version 2.0 (6 months outcome) function;
GRACE_scores()
GRACE 2.0 score function for data frame; GRACE 2.0 = Global Registry of Acute Coronary Events version 2.0

HEART

Functions relating to HEART

HEART()
History, ECG, Age, Risk factors and Troponin (HEART) risk score function
HEART_scores()
HEART risk score function for data frame; HEART = History, ECG, Age, Risk factors, Troponin

SCORE2

Functions relating to SCORE

SCORE2()
Systematic COronary Risk Evaluation (SCORE) model function
SCORE2_scores()
SCORE2/OP risk score function for data frame; SCORE2/OP = Systematic COronary Risk Evaluation /and Older Population
SCORE2_Asia_Pacific()
SCORE2-Asia-Pacific
SCORE2_CKD()
Systematic COronary Risk Evaluation (SCORE) model function including chronic kidney disease (CKD) measures
SCORE2_CKD_scores()
SCORE2/OP with CKD add-on risk score function for a data frame; SCORE2/OP = Systematic COronary Risk Evaluation /and Older Population CKD = Chronic kidney disease
SCORE2_Diabetes()
SCORE2-Diabetes

TIMI

Functions relating to TIMI

TIMI()
Thrombolysis In Myocardial Infarction (TIMI) Risk Score for UA/NSTEMI function
TIMI_scores()
TIMI UA/NSTEMI Risk Score function for data frame; TIMI = Thrombolysis In Myocardial Infarction

CAD

Functions relating to coronary artery disease (CAD)

CAD_Consortium_func()
Coronary Artery Disease Consortium Score (Low Prevalence Model)

Utilities

Utilities functions

calc_scores()
Six commonly used cardiovascular risk scores for the prediction of major cardiac events (MACE)
round_to_nearest_digit()
Round To Nearest Digit
